Getting StartedÂ¶

To begin using the application, follow these steps:

  1. Install required packages: Install all dependencies listed in the requirements file by running:

    pip install -r requirements.txt

  2. Apply database migrations: Set up the database schema according to the defined models:

    python manage.py migrate

  3. Launch the development server: Start the application locally with:

    python manage.py runserver

    The application will be accessible at: http://127.0.0.1:8000/.

  4. Stop the server: To stop the server, press Ctrl + C in the terminal.

oc-lettings
